description: Number of labeled trees of nonempty sets with n points. (Each node is a set of 1 or more points.)
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..100
Index entries for sequences related to trees
formula: E.g.f.: B(e^x-1) where B is e.g.f. of A000272.a(n) = Sum_{k=1..n} Stirling2(n, k)*k^(k-2). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Sep 20 2003
mathematica: a[0] = 1; a[n_] := Sum[StirlingS2[n, k]*k^(k - 2), {k, 1, n}]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 18}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Sep 09 2013, after Vladeta Jovovic *)
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Jan 04 1999
